item.description: Plant Genetic 植物遺傳選文第一篇 傳說中的經典論文，Creighton and McClintock 1931 年發表在 PNAS 的 A Correlation of Cytological and Genetical Crossing-Over in Zea Mays
植物遺傳選文第二篇 hosoba toge toge, a Syndrome Caused by a Large Chromosomal Deletion Associated with a T-DNA Insertion in Arabidopsis
